posts.title: Homework
posts.content:
Hi everyone, this is the 2nd post and I just watched Miami choke the college football championship my oh my. But here we are. I was given some homework and I thought posting it here would be perfect since i need to write it all out anyway for next week so lets start!

Q1 - What values do you consider most important in your life? 

A1 - Honesty, Loyalty, Knowledge, and curiosity

Q2 - What three changes can you make to live according to your personal values?

A2 - One change is to be more honest to strangers. I do love lying to strangers especially while drunk but maybe I do it too much so I can slow down on that. I can Definity start learning more as I've been doing the past 3 weeks. I have been learning a lot more about performance art and reading authors I have never heard of. Lastly I can be more curious when it comes to life. I am moving in early February and that gives me the perfect opportunity to be more curious with people around me and places.

Q3 - Describe yourself using the first 10 words that come to mind. Then, list 10 words that you'd like to use to describe yourself. List a few ways to transform those descriptions into reality.

A3 -  First 10 words that come to mind - Skinny, Boring, Acne prone, Sad, Nervous, Excited, Big Eyes, Motivated, Artist, Unlovable
10 Words I'd like - Funny, Intelligent, Loveable, Wanted, Open to anything, Passionate, Loyal, Patient, Intune, Creative
Ways to transform - Skin care routine which I am doing, Study and learn more, be more patient and listen before acting.

Q4 - What do you appreciate most about your personality? What aspects do you find harder to accept?

A4 - I love how open I am and how loyal I truly am and how much I thrive to be better in every aspect with future relationships and work ethic and knowledge. 
I find being consistent on things to be hard to accept because with consistency comes leaving a certain me in the past which is a good and bad thing.

Q5 - Explore an opinion or two you held in the past but have since questioned or changed. What led you to change that opinion?

A5 -  I think something I have questioned recently is if I was truly loved by people in the past or not. In my opinion I feel like I was but love is such an easy and hard thing at that the same and when you sit back and think of everything friends and past partners have done for you you have to ask yourself if it was truly love in that friendship or in that relationship or just the act of doing or even the act of not doing things for me. It's weird. It's also hard to compare what you're receiving from someone versus what others are receiving for their friends or partners because every relationship is different so it's truly just hard to come to a conclusion on if I was. 

Q6 - List three personal beliefs you're willing to reconsider or further explore.

A6 - First one is i personally do not believe in ghost but I am willing to further explore this one and get my own answers! (I do know there's aliens out there it was like confirmed years ago) 
Second one is I believe everyone is kind which I do not believe anymore. Some people are not nice people, they have moments but some people truly have more hate then love in their hearts and I feel sorry for them.
Lastly I believe karma is very real and I want to further explore karma and everything that comes with good and bad actions you take in life. 

Q7 - Finish the sentence: "My life would be incomplete without..."

A7 - My life would be incomplete without having a group of friends who come over to my apartment / house and drink and have a good time. I really yearn for this. With my new apartment my main goal is to make a great group of friends who comes over and we just have a good time. Smoke, drink, play games, watch things. I want others to have my apartment key and come and go as they please. I want to be the person they know they can come over whenever and ill always be there for them and a place for them to escape whatever is after them. I cannot live without that. I yearn. 

Q8- Describe one or two significant life events that helped shape you into who you are today. 

A8 - I think two big life events that shaped me into who I am today is honestly my experiences in college and my romantic relationships. Without college experiences and all the up and downs that brought I would still be lost in life. And without my romantic relationships I simply wouldn't have learned how to be a better me and how to grow. All the pain that comes when things end bad only provide a chance to grow so you don't have to feel that way again and that itself is helpful regardless of the pain that needs to come first.

Q9 - When do you trust yourself most? When do you find it harder to have faith your instincts? 

A9 - I trust myself most when I have time to process my feelings and make an opinion form there. I used to react quick and that wasn't a time where I was have trust in myself and my words but when I have time to digest and think I feel trustworthy in my words and actions. Hard to have faith in my instincts when I am reacting out of emotion, which again is something that I have found to be easy to control given time.

Q10 - What three things would you most like others (loved ones, potential friends and partners, professional acquaintances, etc.) to know about you?

A10 - I would like others to know how down I am for anything. I will rarely say no to an event or an outing or an idea and I really like that about myself. I would also like others to know how much I care. I care so much about people especially with people I love and that care never fades. Finally I'd like others to know how dependent I am. They can always count on me to be up for them, to be at their call if needed. No matter how far the drive or train or plane I would always be there. That is something maybe I should have more self respect on but it's not something Id want to change since I love being able to be that person who is always there.

posts.title: My First Post!
posts.content:
Hello everyone, this post will be going live on 1/19/2026 and I will be uploading a post on here once a day. If I do post more then just once a day you can always check in my archives at the top right to see if I posted anything else earlier in the day. I wanted to make this website so I had somewhere to post just random thoughts and things I want to talk about. I also made a couple websites last year that were not my best work at all and I feel bad for the person since again those website were not my best work. I made this one today since work has been pretty slow and i'm really proud with how it came out. I wanted to go with a purple and green theme but very lowkey on it. Lets talk about the rest of this website real quick and everything to come.

**MW at the top left**
This is my initals (obviously) and will take you to the home page when you click it (right where you are reading this at!) So will the **Today** Tab

**Archive**
The archive as I explained earlier is the place where you can see all past post. Everyday there will be a current post or "reflection" and all the previous ones will be sent to the archive. I wanted this so others who view my website can always view my past post and for myself to reflect on what I was posting on a specific day. 

**Visuals**
For the Visuals tab this is mostly photos off Pinterest but will be adding real life ones eventually. I like the visual portion of this website to really represent me and my thoughts. Every photo on there is chosen on purpose and for a reason. Each one has a meaning that I can relate to or I can associate with. I will never have just random photos in there. 

**About**
The about me is as simple as it sounds, just a few photos of me and a little about me. It also has my socials at the bottom incase you ever want to get into contact! 

**Support**
This one might be the dumbest one but I though I would have it there incase any of my post or visuals or anything else makes someone feel that they want to support. 


> I also really like that I added this and wanted to try it out LOL, I hope it looks good!


Anyways, that's the run down of this website. I'm really proud of how it looks currently and cannot wait to continue to add to this website. The main goal is to just post everyday about my thoughts and feelings and dreams and whatever else comes to my mind. I hope you all enjoy.
